Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC!!
Reviews.Author: Wayne D.
Reviews.Content: If there were more than 5 stars, I'd use them!Constantly surprised at the low light resolution of this camera!  Many of the indoor photos look better without the flash than with it.Love the sports mode photography.  Went to a softball game and was able to catch the ball coming in, making contact with the bat and on the way out!

Reviews.Title: Just fantastic!!!
Reviews.Author: Robbie Godfrey
Reviews.Content: As each day passes I look forward more and more to getting out my D3200 and looking for something to shoot. I'm a novice and this camera bundle with its two lenses makes me want to capture more images and learn more about photography. It's just perfect and I love it. Now for that tripod and decent, mountable, vary-directional flash and I'll be all set!I will say, though, that the sun shade featured in the bundle pic is a bit pointless as a better one comes with the camera anyway - why not feature that one? But there is nothing i can think of that would detract from a five star rating. Decent price; the delivery was awesome; I called the distributor who gave excellent advice and previously I was a Canonite (and I still remain so, just that I'm now enjoying Nikon too) but the images .... Just fantastic!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: James Z.
Reviews.Content: Does everything advertised and more, especially happy with action  sport shots. Would recommend to anyone.Good quality product for the price.
